CustomField.formula: IF(ISNULL(EndDate__c), IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(FirstLevelComplaintClassification__c, "Reclamo Scritto"),ISPICKVAL(FirstLevelComplaintClassification__c, "Richiesta di informazioni")), SendDate__c + 30, SendDate__c + 20), IF(TEXT(Cluster__c) = 'Reclami',EndDate__c, null) )
CustomField.label: Data Scadenza Reclamo
